altTitles.en: Call of Duty Vanguard: Polina Petrova

description.en: “The best female sniper in the history of Polina Petrova” released today depicts the past of the brilliant female sniper “Polyna Petrova” that appears in “Vanguard”. By revealing the roots of the character that was not talked about in the main part of “Vanguard”, it is a content that not only those who played the game but also those who have not played can know the charm of the most popular character Polina of this work. increase. Please enjoy the story of Polina who stands up as a warrior running at the forefront while being tossed by the harsh fate, along with the “MANGA” style brushstrokes by Dr. Mashima.
description.pt-br: “A melhor sniper feminina da história: Polina Petrova”. Lançado hoje, retrata o passado da brilhante sniper “Polina Petrova” que aparece em “Vanguard”. Ao revelar as raízes do personagem que não foi falado na parte principal de “Vanguard”, é um conteúdo que não só quem jogou o jogo, mas também quem não jogou pode conhecer o charme do personagem mais popular do jogo. Por favor, aproveite a história de Polina, que se destaca como uma guerreira correndo na vanguarda enquanto é lançada pelo destino cruel, junto com as pinceladas estilo “MANGA” do Dr. Mashima.
description.ru: Предыстория Полины Петровой из игры Call of Duty: Vanguard в исполнении Хиро Машимы (Fairy Tail, Rave, EDENS ZERO).

biography.en:
Hiro Mashima (真島 ヒロ, Mashima Hiro, born May 3, 1977) is a Japanese manga artist. He gained success with his first serial Rave Master, published in Kodansha's Weekly Shōnen Magazine from 1999 to 2005. His best-selling work, Fairy Tail, published in the same magazine from 2006 to 2017, became one of the best-selling manga series with over 72 million copies in print. Mashima began the currently ongoing Edens Zero in 2018.

Mashima-Sensei is known for many things, but his big three tend to be an art style heavily reminiscent of One Piece, a love for the power of friendship, and a strong work ethic - at one point, he wrote six chapters of Fairy Tail in two weeks, and even now simultaneously balances drawing Edens Zero, doing storyboards for Fairy Tail spin-offs, and playing video games in his spare time.

His best-selling work, Fairy Tail, published in the same magazine from 2006 to 2017, became one of the best-selling manga series with over 72 million copies in print. Mashima began the currently ongoing Edens Zero in 2018.

Mashima-Sensei is known for many things, but his big three tend to be an art style heavily reminiscent of One Piece, a love for the power of friendship, and a strong work ethic - at one point, he wrote six chapters of Fairy Tail in two weeks, and even now simultaneously balances drawing Edens Zero, doing storyboards for Fairy Tail spin-offs, and playing video games in his spare time.
